flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Modern microcontrollers can host quite sophisticated algorithms; CAROLL illustrates what we can do with a 5$ microcontroller, and some free time.
guide.introduction_rendered: Modern microcontrollers can host quite sophisticated algorithms; CAROLL illustrates what we can do with a 5$ microcontroller, and some free time.
guide.summary:
CAROLL is a robot learning to seek the light. It got a reward when the amount of light it collects increases. Using a reinforcement algorithm, it chooses the actions that will optimizes this reward. 
Cheap, it costs less than 100 euros.
guide.title: CAROLL : a learning robot
